typeSystemDescription.name: OAQATypes
typeSystemDescription.description:
Type system descriptor for the OAQA data model.
$Id:$

typeDescription.name: org.oaqa.model.OAQATop
typeDescription.description: The base class for OAQA feature structures that are not Annotations.

featureDescription.name: componentId
featureDescription.description: The unique id of the component that created this instance.

featureDescription.name: probability
featureDescription.description: The annotator's estimate of the probability associated with this annotation.

typeDescription.name: org.oaqa.model.OAQAAnnotation
typeDescription.description: The Question Analysis supertype that defines the attributes common to all question analysis results.

featureDescription.name: componentId
featureDescription.description: The unique id of the component that created this instance.

featureDescription.name: probability
featureDescription.description: The annotator's estimate of the probability associated with this annotation.
